entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 90 km/h gusting to 110 becoming southwest 30 early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:06 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
